entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
